title: league of legends client randomly started to not launch
body: so i was playing league earlier today absolutely fine. no problems. Then I tried to play a game later on and the client wouldn't start up. I ran both administrator and normal and nothing happens. The league of legends symbol comes up for a few seconds then dissapears. the windows circle still spins for a few seconds after the league symbol dissapears and then nothing... please help

replies.body: read the 50 other threads from today about the same issue.  they ahve solutions already posted
you tried both deleting items in RADS folder, and fixing Avast (if you have it?  or other anti virus program)
how do i delete the items in rads folder? did the avast option and it still isnt working

> [{quoted}](name=Cieux,realm=OCE,application-id=ElA0rvVL,discussion-id=KBxnGR5Y,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2016-02-13T00:48:20.455+0000)
>
> first, try this: 
> ____
> Game Won't Start After I Hit the .exe / Play button
> 
> 1. Try running as an admin by right clicking on the executable and selecting "Run As" and "Administrator", or by using the lol.admin.launcher.exe
> 
> 2a. Delete everything inside the your RADS downloads folder (Default Path is, C:\Riot Games\League of Legends\RADS\downloads) AND
> 2b. Delete everything inside your RADS solutions folder ( Default Path is, C:\Riot Games\League of Legends\RADS\solutions)
> 2c. Restart your computer and repatch
> _____
